help-file.title: "SOUL LINK"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Up to 10 hours, dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
This spell links the essences of the caster and the spell's recipient. An enhancement of healing in the spell recipient is created by the link. However, the caster will sacrifice his ability to absorb health while the link is active.
